Class AddReviewController

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.controller.AddReviewController
public class AddReviewController extends Object
Controller class for the add review modal window. Handles creating new reviews for restaurants with star rating and text input, as well as editing and deleting existing reviews.
Author:
Lorenzo Radice

  • Constructor Details

    • AddReviewController

      public AddReviewController()

  • Method Details

    • setRestaurant

      public void setRestaurant(RestaurantDTO restaurant)
      Sets the restaurant for this review. This method should be called after the controller is loaded for creating a new review.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The restaurant to review

    • setReview

      public void setReview(ReviewDTO review)
      Sets an existing review for editing. This method populates the form fields with the existing review data.
      Parameters:
      review - The existing review to edit

    • getCurrentRating

      public int getCurrentRating()
      Gets the current rating selection.
      Returns:
      The currently selected rating (1-5)

    • getReviewText

      public String getReviewText()
      Gets the current review text.
      Returns:
      The text content of the review

    • isEditingMode

      public boolean isEditingMode()
      Checks if the controller is in editing mode.
      Returns:
      true if editing an existing review, false if creating new

    • getExistingReview

      public ReviewDTO getExistingReview()
      Gets the existing review being edited.
      Returns:
      The existing review DTO, or null if creating a new review
